mapper.select: select shop.sname, ordering.onum, ordering.omsg, ordering.odate, common.keyvalue from ordering join shop on ordering.bnum = shop.bnum join common on ordering.ostatus_mikey = common.miner where ordering.mnum = #{mnum} and ordering.ostatus_mikey >= 802;
select onum, osnum, menu.fname, common.keyvalue, fcount, osprice from order_spec join menu on order_spec.fnum = menu.fnum join common on order_spec.foption_mikey = common.miner where onum = #{onum};
